casebody.data:
JAMES FORD, PLAINTIFF, v. WILLIAM AZZOLI, DEFENDANT. Submitted March term, 1925 Decided April 18, 1925.

Before Justices Kaltsch, Black and Campbell.

Por the rule, Kalisch & Kalisch. Contra, Robert H. Doherty. Pee Cueiam.

An examination of the evidence in the cause brings us to the conclusion that the verdict is clearly against the weight of the evidence.

, . A rule may therefore be taken malting this rule absolute and for a venire de novo.
